item.title: 软银集团清算其持有的英伟达股份，根据美国证券交易委员会文件显示
item.description: 软银集团向美国证券交易委员会提交的13-F季度报告显示，该公司已于2025年第四季度清仓所持英伟达股份。【原文：Softbank Group Corp. disclosed that it dissolved its stake in Nvidia during the fourth quarter of 2025, according to Softbank's 13-F filing with the U.S. Securities & Exchange Commission for the period.】

item.title: 德国工会对特斯拉工厂经理提起诽谤诉讼
item.description: 德国金属工会周二表示，已对特斯拉柏林工厂经理提起刑事诉讼，指控其"散布虚假指控"。此举再次表明该工会与这家美国汽车制造商的关系持续恶化。【原文：Germany's IG Metall has filed a criminal complaint against the manager of Tesla's factory near Berlin, accusing him of "spreading false allegations", the union said on Tuesday, in another sign of its souring relations with the U.S. automaker.】

item.title: 沙特公共投资基金清算其在Take-Two Interactive的持股
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金已清算其在Take-Two Interactive公司的持股，监管文件周二显示。此举正值这家游戏发行商备受期待的《侠盗猎车手VI》即将发布之际。【原文：Saudi Arabia's Public Investment Fund has dissolved its stake in Take-Two Interactive , a regulatory filing showed on Tuesday, ahead of the videogame publisher's highly anticipated launch of "Grand Theft Auto VI."】

item.title: 美联储官员古尔斯比：若通胀回归2%轨道 今年或有多次降息可能
item.description: 芝加哥联储主席奥斯坦·古尔斯比周二表示，若通胀率重新回落至央行2%的目标水平，美联储今年可能批准"多次"降息。他淡化近期疲软的消费者价格报告，称该报告掩盖了强劲的服务价格涨幅。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve could approve "several more" interest rate cuts this year if inflation resumes a decline to the central bank's 2% target, Chicago Fed President Austan Goolsbee said on Tuesday, downplaying a recent weak consumer price report as masking strong service price increases.】

item.title: 埃里克·特朗普投资以色列无人机制造商XTEND与佛罗里达建筑公司的合并案
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普之子埃里克·特朗普正投资一笔15亿美元的并购交易，将以色列无人机制造商XTEND与佛罗里达州JFB建筑控股公司合并，此举旨在推动XTEND上市。【原文：Eric Trump, son of U.S. President Donald Trump, is investing in a $1.5 billion merger between Israeli drone maker XTEND and Florida-based JFB Construction Holdings in a deal aimed at taking XTEND public.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，拜耳将斥资105亿美元解决农达除草剂诉讼案
item.description: 据彭博社周二报道，知情人士透露，拜耳公司正计划宣布一项105亿美元的和解方案，以解决当前及未来针对其除草剂"农达"的癌症诉讼。【原文：Bayer is planning to announce a $10.5 billion settlement push to settle current and future cancer lawsuits over its Roundup weedkiller, Bloomberg reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the plan.】

item.title: 欧洲对阵科技巨头，不惜激怒华盛顿
item.description: 欧洲各国正加大对社交媒体公司的施压力度，以回应公众对儿童安全问题的担忧，但此举可能招致美国方面的强烈反弹——脸书和马斯克旗下X等社交平台均源自美国。【原文：European nations are ratcheting up the pressure on social media companies, responding to a public outcry over child safety fears but risking a backlash from the United States, home to the likes of Facebook and Elon Musk's X.】

item.title: 华尔街监管机构呼吁缩减高管薪酬披露范围
item.description: 美国华尔街最高监管机构周二表示，在即将实施的监管改革下，可能有更少的高管需要披露其薪酬的详细信息。【原文：Fewer top corporate executives could be subject to extensive investor disclosures about their compensation under pending regulatory reforms, Wall Street's top regulator said Tuesday.】

item.title: 树莓派股价飙升40% 因CEO买入股票 人工智能话题升温
item.description: 树莓派公司股价周二飙升42%，创下连续两日上涨的纪录。此前该公司首席执行官埃本·厄普顿购入这家陷入困境的英国计算机硬件公司股票，终结了持续数月的下跌趋势。市场传言称，该公司的产品可能受益于低成本人工智能项目。【原文：Shares in Raspberry Pi rose as much as 42% on Tuesday in a record two‑day rally after CEO Eben Upton bought stock in the beaten‑down UK computer hardware firm, halting a months‑long slide, as chatter grew that its products could benefit from low‑cost artificial‑intelligence projects.】

item.title: 西甲联赛获法院命令，强制VPN屏蔽16个涉嫌盗版网站
item.description: 西班牙足球甲级联赛及其转播合作伙伴西班牙电信公司周二获得法院命令，要求VPN服务商NordVPN和Proton VPN在西班牙境内屏蔽16个涉嫌非法直播西甲赛事的网站。【原文：Spain's LaLiga and its broadcasting partner Telefónica secured a court order on Tuesday requiring VPN providers NordVPN and Proton VPN to block access within Spain to 16 websites accused of illegally streaming LaLiga matches.】

item.title: 奥玛特与内华达能源公司签署150兆瓦地热发电协议，为内华达州谷歌公司供电
item.description: 可再生能源企业奥玛特科技公司周二宣布，已与内华达能源公司签署长期地热电力购买协议，为谷歌在内华达州的运营提供支持。【原文：Renewable energy company Ormat Technologies said on Tuesday that it has entered into a long-term geothermal power purchase agreement with NV Energy to support Google's operations in Nevada.】

item.title: 法国人工智能公司Mistral收购云服务初创企业Koyeb
item.description: 法国人工智能公司Mistral AI周二宣布，已同意以未披露金额收购总部位于巴黎附近的云计算服务初创企业Koyeb。【原文：French artificial intelligence company Mistral AI said on Tuesday it had agreed to buy cloud computing service startup Koyeb based near Paris for an undisclosed amount.】

item.title: 美国住宅建筑商信心持续低迷，购房负担能力问题持续存在
item.description: 周二公布的一项调查显示，美国住宅建筑商信心指数在2月份恶化，原因是土地和建筑成本持续高企，以及房价相对于收入水平仍处于高位，导致潜在购房者持观望态度。【原文：U.S. homebuilder sentiment deteriorated in February, weighed down by persistently high land and construction costs as well as still-elevated house prices relative to incomes that are keeping prospective buyers on the sidelines, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 印度要求全球科技平台遵守宪法，此前出台更严格的内容管理规定
item.description: 印度信息部长周二表示，谷歌旗下的YouTube、Meta、X和Netflix等大型科技平台必须在该国宪法框架内运营。此前一周，新德里政府收紧了内容下架规则。【原文：India's information minister said on Tuesday that big tech platforms like Google's YouTube, Meta , X and Netflix must operate within the country's constitutional framework, a week after New Delhi tightened its content-takedown rules.】

item.title: 埃利奥特建仓挪威邮轮10%股权，推动董事会改组
item.description: 埃利奥特管理公司周二披露，已持有挪威邮轮控股公司10%的股权。这家激进投资机构正推动改革以扭转这家邮轮运营商的经营局面。【原文：Elliott Management on Tuesday disclosed it has built a 10% stake in Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings , as the activist investor pushes for changes to turn around the cruise operator.】

item.title: 加拿大1月年度通胀率小幅回落，汽油价格下降
item.description: 加拿大统计局周二表示，1月份加拿大年度通胀率增速较上月放缓，原因是汽油价格大幅下跌，抵消了食品和服装价格上涨的影响。【原文：Canada's annual inflation rate in January accelerated at a slower pace than the previous month as a big drop in gasoline prices helped cushion the impact of higher food and clothing prices, Statistics Canada said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Vulcan Materials公布季度业绩不佳，股价下跌
item.description: 建筑材料制造商Vulcan Materials周二公布的第四季度业绩低于华尔街预期，因住宅建筑活动疲软抑制了对混凝土、沥青和骨料的需求。【原文：Construction supplies manufacturer Vulcan Materials reported fourth-quarter results below Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, as weak residential construction activity curbed demand for its concrete, asphalt and aggregates.】

item.title: 丹纳赫以99亿美元收购马西莫
item.description: 丹纳赫将以99亿美元（含债务）收购脉搏血氧仪制造商美思明，这家合同研究公司正致力于扩大其诊断产品组合。【原文：Danaher will acquire pulse oximeter maker Masimo for $9.9 billion including debt, as the contract research firm looks to bulk up its diagnostics portfolio.】

item.title: Labcorp预测年度利润将因诊断产品需求强劲而保持乐观
item.description: 实验室服务提供商Labcorp周二预测全年利润将超出华尔街预期，其诊断检测业务的强劲需求是主要支撑因素。【原文：Laboratory services provider Labcorp forecast annual profit above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, banking on robust demand for its diagnostic tests.】

item.title: 交易平台eToro因跨资产类别增长超出盈利预期
item.description: 股票和加密货币交易平台eToro周二公布的第四季度利润超出预期，这得益于其提供的各类资产表现强劲。【原文：Stock and crypto trading platform eToro beat estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Tuesday on strength across the asset classes it offers.】

item.title: 利迪奥斯公司因政府停摆影响未达季度营收预期
item.description: 国防承包商利多斯控股公司公布的第四季度营收低于华尔街预期，原因是去年持续六周的美国政府停摆影响了该公司的订单量。【原文：Defense contractor Leidos Holdings reported fourth-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates, as the six-week long U.S. government shutdown last year weighed on the firm's orders.】

item.title: CNH工业公司因农机需求疲软，警告2026年利润将走弱
item.description: 全球农业和工程机械制造商CNH工业公司周二预测全年利润将低于华尔街预期，原因是农产品价格低迷、投入成本高企以及贸易政策变化，这些因素共同抑制了对农业机械的需求。【原文：Global manufacturer of farm and construction equipment CNH Industrial on Tuesday forecast full-year profit below Wall Street estimates, as low crop prices, high input costs and shifting trade policies weigh on demand for agricultural machinery.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，激进投资者Jana Partners增持Fiserv股份
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二报道，激进投资者Jana Partners已增持Fiserv股份，并敦促这家支付公司采取措施提振其低迷的股价。【原文：Activist investor Jana Partners has built a stake in Fiserv and is pressing the payments company to pursue steps to lift its lagging share price, the Wall Street journal reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: Temporal在人工智能智能体热潮中完成3亿美元融资，本轮由安德森领投
item.description: 软件初创公司Temporal向路透社透露，在安德森·霍洛维茨领投的融资轮中筹集了3亿美元，公司估值达50亿美元。随着支持人工智能系统的基础设施需求日益增长，该公司获得了这笔资金。【原文：Software startup Temporal has raised $300 million in a funding round led by Andreessen Horowitz, valuing the company at $5 billion, as demand rises for infrastructure to support artificial intelligence systems, the company told Reuters.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟拒绝派拉蒙修订后的报价，但给予该制片厂一周时间协商更优方案
item.description: 华纳兄弟公司在一份声明中表示，华纳兄弟探索公司已拒绝派拉蒙天空舞影业最新提出的每股30美元的敌意收购要约，但给予这家好莱坞制片公司七天时间，看看能否提出更优厚的收购方案，以收购HBO Max和《哈利·波特》系列的拥有者。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery has rejected Paramount Skydance's latest $30-a-share hostile takeover bid, but is giving the Hollywood studio seven days to see if it can come up with a better deal to buy the owner of HBO Max and the "Harry Potter" franchise, Warner Bros said in a statement.】

item.title: Sateliot与PLD Space将联合发射两颗5G卫星，开启西班牙首次太空任务
item.description: 卫星初创企业Sateliot与航天工程公司PLD Space周二宣布，双方已签署协议，将联合发射两颗5G卫星。这将是西班牙企业首次独立完成的此类商业航天任务。【原文：Satellite startup Sateliot and space engineering firm PLD Space have signed a deal to launch two 5G satellites in what will be the first such private mission carried out solely by Spanish companies, they said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 晨间竞价：昏昏欲睡的超级多头
item.description: 当今美国及全球市场中真正重要的因素【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 美敦力季度利润超预期，得益于心脏设备需求强劲
item.description: 美敦力公司周二公布的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，其心脏设备和糖尿病监测仪的强劲需求推动了业绩增长。【原文：Medtronic surpassed Wall Street expectations for third-quarter profit on Tuesday, buoyed by strong demand for its heart devices and diabetes monitors.】

item.title: 高通表示将撤回在英国针对智能手机芯片专利费的诉讼
item.description: 高通周二表示，伦敦法院受理的一起指控其滥用市场支配地位迫使苹果和三星支付过高专利费的诉讼将被撤回。【原文：Qualcomm on Tuesday said a London lawsuit alleging it had abused its dominant position to force Apple and Samsung to pay inflated royalties will be withdrawn.】

item.title: 通用磨坊下调全年销售额和利润预期
item.description: 通用磨坊周二下调了年度核心净销售额和利润预期，归咎于宏观经济不确定性导致的消费者信心减弱。【原文：General Mills on Tuesday cut its annual core net sales and profit forecasts, blaming weakening consumer sentiment amid macroeconomic uncertainty.】
